data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Pavlodar who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pavlodar, Kazakhstan

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Pavlodar, Kazakhstan.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 4,430 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Pavlodar to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people know you.
Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 4,430 believers living in Pavlodar, Kazakhstan.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Pavlodar, Kazakhstan to the gospel today.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Pavlodar to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

location.name: Pavlodar
